# safari

𓊄 𓃀 𓂻 𓏭 | travel | safari

causative of far/fahr(fair), see part

far => safari 𓋴 𓍯 𓄿 𓅱 𓈐 𓂻 journey ⇔ 𓍯 𓄿 𓈐 far
fahr => safari 𓋴 𓍯 𓄿 𓅱 𓈐 𓂻 (travel) < caporeía 𓐍 𓊪 𓂻 = travel ⇔ curve

sa'fahren = travel ⇔ separate depart bear(bore,born)

𓊃 𓊪 𓊗 | venture | Safari
𓊃 𓊪 𓊗 | success | सफल saphala > सफलता saphaltā सफ़लता safaltā (se'√fruit)
𓊃 𓊪 𓊗 | chance | Zufall

𓋴 𓍑 𓄿 𓂻 | travel, depart (in sense of die) | safari ⇔ 𓍑 pyro πορεία

𓋴 𓍯 𓄿 𓅱 𓈐 𓂻 | journey | safari™ ⇔ 𓍯 𓄿 𓈐 far

𓋴 𓅱 𓅱 𓏏 𓏏 𓂻 walk about, journey, travel, go forth spatzieren 𓅱⇔𓅪𓅫 streifen ⇔ 𓋴 𓅱 𓅱 safari?

𓋴 𓐪 𓂧 𓀢 𓀀 | sailor, traveller | shaiffarter sea-farer safari™
𓋴 𓐪 𓂧 𓀢 𓀀 | sailor, traveller | shiboatler > shiffler > sailor?

𓊄 𓃀 𓏮 𓂻 | travel, pass (time)| safari

𓐍 𓊪 𓅱 𓂻 𓏥 | journeys | caporeía سفرية safareya سفر safari πορεία kurfahrt fahria-ho
𓐍 𓊪 𓂻 | travel | 𐍈𐌰𐌹𐍂𐌱𐌰𐌽 karaβαίν > karavan 𐎣𐎠𐎼 •hwerbaną 'Kurven'

≠ safir = bright white

𓋴 𓈖 𓃀 𓏏 𓊗 𓏮 | farewell | •sane Fahrt ⇔ safari < synpharit

𓐍 𓈖 𓌰 𓅓 𓋴 𓁒 𓀀 | friend | con-ⲙⲉⲧϣⲫⲏⲣ 𒀉𒁀𒊒 ᵐit-ba-ru 𓅓 𓋴 𓁒 𓀀 ⲙⲉⲧϣⲫⲏⲣ +++

ⲛϣⲫⲏⲣ hmn-shaphar “friend” ϣⲫⲏⲣ ⇔ Špor ⇔ Sportler ≠ Separate
